TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {213283=Jindal Steel is in the Steel - Sponge Iron sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 6,870.93 crore. The company management includes Savitri Jindal - Chairman Emeritus, Naveen Jindal - Chairman, Ravi Uppal - Managing Director & Group CEO, Dinesh Kumar Saraogi - Whole Time Director, Ratan Jindal - Director, Shallu Jindal - Director, R V Shahi - Independent Director, A K Purwar - Independent Director, Arun Kumar - Independent Director, Haigreve Khaitan - Independent Director, Hardip Singh Wirk - Independent Director, Sudershan Kumar Garg - Independent Director, Rajiv Sharma - Nominee Director, Ratan Jindal - Director, Savitri Jindal - Chairman Emeritus, Naveen Jindal - Chairman, V R Sharma - Deputy Managing Director, Ravi Uppal - Managing Director & CEO, Ajit Ingle - Nominee Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532286 and the NSE with an NSE Code of JINDALSTEL. Its Registered office is at O.P. Jindal Marg , Hissar,Haryana - 125005. Their Registrars are Alankit Assignment Ltd., 133417=28 July 2015, 134635=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 133928=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 211975=Zensar Technologies Recommended on Mar 24th 2015}
